website_summaries.verdict: Natural biotin shampoo with provitamin B5, zinc, coconut oil, and other botanicals.
pros: Contains biotin, provitamin B5, zinc, coconut oil, and other nourishing botanicals to strengthen hair, stimulate growth, and prevent hair loss
Cleans scalp of dandruff and DHT, which is known to cause thinning hair
Manufacturer offers 100% money-back guarantee if not completely satisfied
cons: A small percentage of customers were disappointed and didn't see the results they expected

customer_reviews.title: Great results. Definitively recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Impressive results in just 13 days. The top of my head was pretty much going bald. It was to the point it was just noticeable the thinning on top of my head. I purchased this product based o all of the positive feedback it had. I've researched hair loss as well and decided to give this a try as a method to combat this problem. I have noticed that the area that was thinning is no longer as bad. Hair is growing and I no longer feel like there's a bald spot on top of my head. All I have to say is that this bottle is worth the money. I am including 2 pictures. Before and after so far.
customer_reviews.author: A.C. Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: A totally no no shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Oh am 30 yrs, and I have been losing hair for over a year now. I take vitamins, biotin etc. And nothing had worked. I decided to buy this shampoo because of the good reviews but oh gosh. How disappointed I am. This shampoo does not work. Leaves my hair, horrible!!!! It dried my hair horribly and started falling even more... :( do not buy it..
customer_reviews.author: Ruby R

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing extreme hair loss, when I moved to Seoul, South Korea’s due to the pollution. I read the reviews on this product, and thought, “Why not?” I used it daily for 8 months not thinking much about it, then I took a side-by-side. This shampoo works! May 2018 vrs Feb 2019
customer_reviews.author: kkam8

customer_reviews.title: Left hair super dry and tangled mess
customer_reviews.text: This is an honest review, not paid for, etc. I was so excited to try this product since my postpartum hair loss has kicked in. Every time I washes with it, I was left with tangled hair that was weak and dry! It took me forever to comb it out and when I was done I had a lot of breakage. I already have thin hair, so this is heartbreaking for me. Not sure how it received so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Product does work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I started using the product due to my medication causing hair loss as a side effect. I used the product as directed and my hair loss stopped, and actually began to regrow. Very little needed to get a nice lather. The product is thick and may necessitate removing the cap to get the product out. Not a big deal. Very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: TIM E GERBER

customer_reviews.title: Hair Stopped Falling Out..
customer_reviews.text: When I first started noticing my hair thinning I started to do research into hair loss shampoo's. I tried several before coming across Biotin shampoo. I really didn't expect much in the way of results but I thought I would give it a try. I am glad i did. Shine, body, thicker hair were my results. Oh ya and the most important of all my hair stopped falling out. The shampoo does have a little chemically smell but not bad. Other than that a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 55 and have endured thin, fine hair my whole life. I have tried literally everything to make my hair appear thicker. Nothing works. This product not only gives my hair the appearance of volume it actually has given me more hair!! The picture on the left was taken my first day of use, December 17th. I used mousse and hairspray. The picture on the right was taken last night right out of the shower. Dried hair, no mousse or hairspray! This product is a miracle!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbora Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: By far the WORST shampoo ever. It does not work and it smells disgusting. The Aragan shampoo is very good, the silk conditioner is very good. This one is NOT. It took several washes to get my hair back to normal. DO NOT believe the REVIEWS
customer_reviews.author: Misschris007

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: First when i got this product it was opened and some of it spilled in the package and I have been using this product for about two months now and have not really seen any results. I still notice hair loss in the shower and it kinda made my hair feel weird.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P Fry

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, MUST READ!!!!
customer_reviews.text: March 2019, Company changed formula and went with cheaper ingredients. The shampoo is now harmful and worsens your hairloss/thinning.
customer_reviews.author: Yaseen Azzam

customer_reviews.title: I see and feel a difference in my hair since using . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have been using since I purchased November, 2017. As this shampoo thoroughly cleans, I do suggest using a light conditioner. I have dyed hair, but it does not affect my color in any way, but do need a conditioner as this shampoo cleans so well. I feel that it has really helped my hair and scalp stay healthy, and will continue to use. Just make sure you leave in your hair 2 minutes or more. Follow directions and you will feel and see a difference in the health of your hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: AstrogirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this shampoo, I noticed that I lost significantly less hair in the shower and that benefit has been consistent. After using this shampoo for 3 months, I found tufts of new hair. Today my hairdresser confirmed it is new hair, which is exciting. I don't use it everyday because I work out and my hair also needs a good cleaning. Even by using it only 3-4 days per week, it is still working. I recommend this product. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is I wish I could use it everyday but I am so glad I found this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Tahnee

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I must be allergic to something in it. My scalp broke out with itchy sores.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L Helton

customer_reviews.title: I have baby fine hair that is almost impossible to find a shampoo ...
customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine hair that is almost impossible to find a shampoo that works well without either stripping my hair or weighing it down. I am more than pleased with how well this shampoo works for my hair- too early to tell for hair growth, but just for its shampoo properties I will definitely be reordering. FYI it is very concentrated so a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Salt/pepper

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm experiencing hair loss due to medication I'm on. I've heard such great reviews about this product after seeing it featured on Buzzfeed and wanted to attempt it. Biggest mistake ever. My hair was falling out nearly twice as much after using it each wash. I stopped using it after 3 washes. A couple other reviews said they changed the formula, maybe this is the case, but i's making my hairless even worse. I'm already speaking to my dr. about changes in my medication, but I know for a fact that I will NEVER use this shampoo again.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was my imagination, surely my hair couldn't be getting more thin from using this....until i went back and read more reviews and saw that other people were saying the same thing. That's right, this stuff can and does cause more thinning. I am hoping and praying that my hair is recovering from it but I would stay away from this product unless you wan't to risk thinning your hair further..It also did not clean my hair worth a crap.
customer_reviews.author: RrB

customer_reviews.title: Biotin shampoo helps hair be thicker and healthier
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly thick hair already but was intrigued by this product's reviews so decided to give it a try. After using it for only about a week I went to have my hair cut and my hairdresser remarked at how much fuller my hair seemed. I showed her the product's ingredients and she said that it's all great stuff for hair and scalp health. I can't comment on how it helps with dandruff or scalp issues but it has improved my hair quite a bit and I've already given one bottle away to a relative with very thin hair. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CC Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Caused SCARY amount of hair loss!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused so much hair loss. I actually jumped out of the shower because i thought i mistakenly put a bathroom cleaning chemical in my hair, we're talking 300+ strands in the shower and 50+ brushing afterwards. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused flaky scalp
customer_reviews.text: Made my scalp flaky and didn't decrease hair loss. A waste...
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: High hopes
customer_reviews.text: Used this entire bottle, noticed absolutely zero difference in volume, texture, or hair regrowth. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Everest Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it has helped my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I could use any shampoo just like you but I can tell you that I continue to reorder it. I am hard to please and usually swap after I empty a bottle but I am sticking with Biotin. Yes, I have seen some improvements in my hair thickness. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paratus

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for 5 months now. No apparent results.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this exactly as directed for about 5 months now. Unfortunately my hair has seen no improvement from when I first started using it. I had waited this long to write a review to make sure I gave it ample time to try to take effect. However I see no difference in the spots that are thinning and if anything (i'd say unrelated) my hair hair has started to fall out more. It gets 2 stars because it smells nice and in itself is a nice shampoo, but it does not achieve the desired end results.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Hair Product that actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am a chemotherapy patient and while I have been lucky that the doseage is low enough to where I haven’t lost my hair, it is noticeably thinner. I started using this product daily about a month ago and my hair is almost back to where it started in terms of fullness and thickness. I am always sceptical of products that claim they can thicken hair or at least prevent further thinning but this product actually works. Just bought my second bottle (it shows how long it lasts, even with daily use). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Moore

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my hair
customer_reviews.text: After 3 washes my hair was dry and brittle and was falling out by the handful - that’s never happened to me before. My scalp was itchy and covered in red spots that were visible around my temples. It was like I was having a break-out on my scalp. Immediately stopped using this. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't notice anything, but it suds up well. No change in the amount of hair falling out. Still have glob of hair, like 15-20 strands come out ea time I shower. I take vitamins and use a hair serum, so I have no idea why this did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my hair. I expected it to add thickness but it didn’t happen for me. Other products work much better.
customer_reviews.author: DrBobbi

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to Help with DHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have read that as a woman ages DHT levels can increase which might affect hair growth and/or loss. Supposedly this shampoo helps with the DHT. DHT has something to do with hormone levels that can affect hair growth. I've used the shampoo alternately with my other shampoos. It does somewhat leave my hair kind of tangled and dry at times so a conditioner is needed. It is okay, but not my favorite shampoo and I will probably not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the great reviews. Unfortunately, it doesn't work for me. It lathers up niceand the smell isn't too bad, but it strips my hair making it so dry it feels like straw. After using one bottle of this shampoo, my hair is still thinning and now it's breaking due you how dried out it is. Save your money and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J.

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: Getting old with thinning hair is no fun. I was looking for a shampoo that would make my hair look and feel thicker Tried several different products with little or no results until I came onto this product. Not only did this make my hair look thicker but it also smells pleasant and cost a fraction of what I was paying for other brands. Give this product a try as you have nothing to loss except for our hair if you don't! :)
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice biotin shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product, I started using this shampoo a short time ago and the results have been fantastic, my hair feels very soft and shiny and it has helped me with the hair loss. I totally recommend it. I also start using a biotin vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso M.

customer_reviews.title: I have fine curly hair which became very dry and unmanageable
customer_reviews.text: My hair was damaged by my hairdresser in June 2017. I have fine curly hair which became very dry and unmanageable. I was searching for a shampoo and conditioner to help me with this problem. Biotin Shampoo is working very well for me along with Nexus Emergencee Conditioner both have brought my hair back to being manageable and looking good again. I am sold on Biotin Shampoo and will be ordering it again very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Fran O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BIOTIN REALLY WORKS MY BEFORE AND AFTER PICS AFTER COUPLE USES I SEEN HAIR GROWTH WILL BE BUYING MORE
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband. His hair is very fine and starting to thin a bit. He loves this shampoo! And I could see a noticeable difference in the texture and feel of his hair within the first week. It also has lasted him a long time -nearly three months! He washes his hair every other day and only uses a nickle-sized drop of shampoo at a time, but it is enough to clean his hair thoroughly and give it fantastic resilience and shine - and it has slowed the thinning. We will be ordering this product again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lysabella

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is awesome. Make sure to read the label and let it sit for 2-3 mins. That's when you'll notice the cooling effect. It's really thick so you don't need to use as much. My hair feels stronger immediately after using it. There's definitely less breakage in the tub. I haven't used it long enough for a before/after, but I can personally tell a difference in the strength and health of my hair. Will update with photo when enough time has went by.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Afro/ Black hair
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing hair loss after years of damage like a lot of women. I took action while I could reverse it. Full disclosure I did the following: Minoxidil (Rogaine Foam) Micro needling This Shampoo shaved head and started over totally I think this shampoo combined with other methods really improved my hair. I tried everything, castor oil, rice water, henna whatever. The only things that worked was ditching the tight styles, rogaine and this shampoo. If you are wondering if you should use this product and you have afro/black hair? Use it. Don't wait. It really helped I will keep using it as my main shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: my hair feels thick for the first time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after seeing it in an online article about "25 must haves from Amazon" . I have always had thin brittle hair from straightening and blow drying for 15 years. I also have a dry scalp. This shampoo makes my hair feel thick and soft and my scalp doesn't itch anymore. The trick is to leave it in your hair while you go about the rest of your shower routine and then rinse it out at the end of your shower. Let the ingredients soak up in your scalp while you shower. I use it about 4-5x per week. This is my third bottle. I'll keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Proven Shampoo it Works
customer_reviews.text: As I have reviewed Biotin Shampoo in the past, I am solid in my reviews, I love this product it has proven to work for both my husband and myself. Saw new hair growth not only in hairline but in part in my hair. I have natural curly hair which can appear very shiny and more manageable! My biggest drawback from consistently using this shampoos is the price!! The company would send me a promo code to give a discount, but Amazon will not honor it because the product is not Supplied and Sold by Amazon. I do hope that this problem can be resolved , I would love to consistently use Biotin Shampoo for Hair Growth!!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: No More Shiny Scalp!
customer_reviews.text: I tried other products with varying degrees of success, but I was still embarrassed by my thinning hair. The Biotin Shampoo worked very quickly. I noticed new growth right away and after repeated orders am happy to say my hair continues to be thicker and fuller. It's important to use as directed. Most shampoos nowadays are rather gentle in composition, as a majority of people wash their hair every day. As a result the gentle shampoos don't totally clear out the pores, resulting in hampered hair growth. While Biotin is gentle, using it as directed provides total cleansing and the ingredients stimulate hair growth. Try it for yourself. I think you'll be very pleased with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the: Price / Scent / Foaming / and actual Shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: Solid for the: Price / Scent / Foaming / and actual Shampoo. While I do not believe Vitamins can be absorbed and utilized through the Scalp, I do however like this Shampoo as an "alternate". I used it every day for the first 3 weeks, and thought it's okay, but not good enough as my only "stand-alone" Shampoo. So, I started alternating it with my Nioxin and together they seemed to work better. I'd buy it a second time. Smells good, foams good, price is good. BUT, only to use it as a secondary shampoo every other day Max. I have NO science to back this up. My hair just seems to like Variety.
customer_reviews.author: Alpacas are watching...

customer_reviews.title: Does make hair feel a little thicker
customer_reviews.text: After using this shampoo (followed by Head&Shoulders Clean Conditioner) my hair does seem to have a little bit more volume. It definitely does make hair feel very silky and healthy, still unsure about decreasing hair shedding. I do feel like I have to wash my hair again the next day, but it might have more to do with my hair oils personally than the shampoo. Overall, pretty happy with it, definitely will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: KV2015

customer_reviews.title: Phil banks
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients I researched and appeared to be good but. Using this with my biotin thickening conditioner I thought my hair would grow faster but this combo did the opposite. Making me lose more hair in troublesome spots , the spots where I didn't apply the shampoo is growing more than where I applied this shampoo. First time I've been called Phillip banks.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Product made my hair fuller and thicker looking
customer_reviews.text: Yet, by no means will this product grow new hair in areas of your head that have been subjected to total hair loss. It will definitely strengthen your hair and eliminate unwanted dandruff from your scalp. I have used this product on a daily basis for over 8 months now and I have noticed the growth of thicker hair strands and less hair loss. Upon first use I felt a slight tingly sensation after application and rinse. But it went away after a couple of uses and it now feels rejuvenating on my scalp. Not to mention that I have to get more frequent hair cuts because of the faster hair growth that I experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Jacko

customer_reviews.title: Used for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for nearly 4 months now. I've noticed only slight changes in my hair's thickness and growth, nothing to go brag about. Now for the cost i cant complain and would still recommend it, but i wouldnt use this as the sole product to restore your hair. It very well could help 'prevent' it from getting bad, but not 'restore'. Pacakaging looks like its straight from aliexpress yet claims to be usa made. All in all, i will continue to use this product and likely buy again if i cannot find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Painter

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty upset at how thin my hair is getting, but this shampoo helps with the overall look. It also feels like a healthy shampoo with no overwhelming fake scents. I'll probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Tried this product twice and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a few months in 2019 along with oral biotin supplements and had definitely noticed my hair thickening and growing out my baby hairs in the front! I moved and left this shampoo at my old home for about 6 months. I noticed my hair thining and my bf kept noticing that my hair has been shedding like crazy at our apartment. Recently I came back to my old home during COVID and have been using this shampoo again for 1 month... and i'm not shedding as much!! My hair feels thicker! SO this is proof for me that this product does work. Nothing like a miracle cure, but it definitely gives you noticeable results.
customer_reviews.author: Pree

customer_reviews.title: This caused my head to itch terribly and my eyes became extremely swollen
customer_reviews.text: Allergic reaction! This caused my head to itch terribly and my eyes became extremely swollen. A little research into the ingredients and found that some of the chemicals in it are fairly harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients changed and they didn’t update the pictures on the page when I was purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of the scent or the quality of the product. And it would have been nice to know the updated ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: For you guys who are having issue with hair loss
customer_reviews.text: This here is by far the only hair shampoo that has actually helped me with my hair loss problems. I understand that the smaller bottle is the way to go as it is the original and most efficient recipe and I have to say that within a week I had seen my shower with solid evidence that my hair had slowed down and nearly completely stopped. Call it a miracle shampoo if you want because I will have to agree that in the months that I've used it my hair has become fuller and my hair rinse offs with way less to no noticible hair stuck on my fingers
customer_reviews.author: andres lillo

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with thinning hair, and one spot on the crown of my head was particularly concerning. I had to take care to brush my hair to cover that spot. This shampoo has helped my hair to recover to the point that I no longer need to fuss with that one spot. A little bit goes a long way. I'm a woman with shoulder length hair and some shampoos require a palm full to create good lather. I only need a little quarter size spot on my hand to get great lather, so it goes a long way. It smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Or Kathie Young

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo for my hair as it is very thin from medications I have to take to prevent migraines. I have only been using it for a few weeks but so far I have less hair falling out. That is a great sign especially after trying numerous shampoos, supplements, and anything else claiming to help. It can leave your hair a little dry so a good moisturizing conditioner is helpful. It's too early to tell on new hair growth but I am hopeful. I will update. My only complaint is that it is difficult to get the shampoo out with this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I grow hair everywhere BUT where I use this
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Great for restoring weighed down hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair, and for many years after giving birth, I tried to find anything that would help with regrowth and volume. I had an area on my scalp that I was very embarrassed about because it was very thin there. I tried this shampoo because of one of those “33 things on Amazon that you never knew you needed” kind of lists and figured the thousands of reviews couldn’t be all wrong. My hair finally feels clean, not weighed down, has more volume, and I don’t have an embarrassing spot on my scalp anymore. I will always have this shampoo now.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Gentle enough for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I wash my long hair daily which is a no no for most women with long hair but I workout almost daily so it’s a must. I noticed I was shedding more hair than usual so I decided to try this shampoo. I haven’t noticed a huge difference in terms of hair growth but I do like that it’s gentle on my scalp. It’s become a welcome change in my routine and the price is on point. I previously used a variety of more expensive shampoos: kiehls amino acid, Amika, verb ghost shampoo. I like this ones price and results.
customer_reviews.author: yleecayoteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I started using this shampoo in early 2020. I was skeptical at first, I didn’t notice a change right away. When I was about 2/3 of the way through my first bottle, I noticed new hair growth. I just recently got into see my hairdresser and I asked her if she could tell a difference. She noted the new hair growth, at first she thought it might be breakaways from hair ties, but then noticed it more throughout the head. To add to it, I like the scent as well. It smells clean and fresh to me, not perfume-y at all.
customer_reviews.author: m122

customer_reviews.title: Hair like straw.
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the shampoo and conditioner and this stuff made my hair hard, tangled and feel like straw. It was so awful that my fingers couldn’t even get through it when I was trying to shampoo my hair. I don’t know what is in this but I’ve tried it 3 times md each tim my hair was like washing it in some sort or glue. I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Proc Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells terrible. My wife hates it. I can’t say if it works 100% or not because I follow up it’s use with Parador That smells great and makes my hair soft. But sometimes things that smell bad work good.... also I have already paid for them both and I can’t make sense of rolling out of the shower with my head stinking. So I do both. Maybe this will prove to be the magic 1 2 punch??? Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D Renwick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally thick hair. Like infamously thick hair. I go to a hairdresser and they always run their fingers through it. I will admit, I pay good money for products. Pete and Pedro has me for 100 bucks a pop for their shampoo and conditioner. I will say, for a 1/3 of the price, I get better results with the Honeydew Shampoo and Conditioner. The scent is on point too. Once I started, I never looked back. It's very versatile too. My daughter has dry scalp, my other had a touch of dandruff, a couple uses of this combo and they are back on point. Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martinus Riovanni

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I've been using this and I'm not bald but I don't notice thicker hair. Does this even work?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 1 year. No difference. While my mother's father was bald at 19 (I'm 36), my father had hair, albeit thin, until death at 73. I have thinning hair in the front, but only the beginning of baldness. In terms of "hair growth" I would rate this at 0. In terms of "maintain your hair" I'd give it 4 stars. Pros Not expensive Cons You're not going to start an 80s band after using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo since January but was waiting on my old shampoo to run out first. I started using this last week and worst decision ever. My hair has fallen out like crazy, like never before. The return window is now closed for me otherwise I would have return it. Anyway it is now in the trash because it’s pure trash and no one should waste their time on this. I really regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Keke

customer_reviews.title: Works good, smells bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn on this review. I did notice less hair falling out. It did not stimulate any new growth (after 3 months). The problem was the smell. It's tolerable but really not good... and I can put up with a lot. I started using "Mane & Tail" shampoo and conditioner. There is absolutely NO hair loss. It's not meant to stimulate new growth, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Talkdtwo

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for hair thinning!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for thinning hair after I noticed was getting very thin at the crown and in my part. I used it as directed and in a matter of a few months, my hair was looking more normal again. After a while, there was no longer any evidence of thinning!!! I love that it takes just a little of the shampoo to work up an incredible lather!! I am still using Biotin and will continue to do so to prevent any further hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first bottle in June 2020 and was using 2 times a week as it would make my scalp itchy. Then as the weeks went by I noticed more hair was failing out to the point that now you can even see my scalp. Today my girlfriend and I were showering and I was shampooing my hair when she stopped me and said I had so many hairs on my forehead that fell off and said to STOP using the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Barreras

customer_reviews.title: This made my hair fall out. Also made it extremely dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.text: My hair was already thinning. I bought this in hopes that it would help strengthen/grow. This made my hair extremely dry and brittle, to the point where I couldn't brush it because I was getting so much breakage. Also the amount of hair falling out after using it was startling. I am so disappointed and upset over this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 8 months now and without prompting my wife commented that she thought my "male pattern" bald spot (thinned hair) looked thicker and less bald. Up until this month I've been using Thumos conditioner with this product, but now am using the Biotin conditioner too. In addition to the improvement to my hair follicles, I think this shampoo is gentler to my skin. With most off-the-shelf shampoo products I get skin reactions that cause itching and inflammation. None of that happens with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis White

customer_reviews.title: Made my WHOLE HEAD THIN OUT!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! I bought this April 2020 excited to use because of all the great reviews but I came to realize it has great reviews because it offers a free bottle if you leave a great review, who wouldn’t? FREE IS FREE, you get what you paid for. I had a little area thinning out and here I am July 2020 with a whole head thinning out at 29 years old :( I’ve been working so hard to grow it out and my hair is so fragile now and feels HORRIBLE and thin all over. Beware of products that offer free with good review. Wish I can get my money back and my hair back and didn’t purchase this. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rentas

customer_reviews.title: not bald, but my thinning head is significantly thicker than before i tried Biotin shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I saw that this was one of the highest rated products that people were buying - and after reading all the positive reviews, I'm shocked to say that my hair is ABSOLUTELY thicker than before- I was not bald at the start, but my hair line was creeping back and thinning on top- 4 weeks after using the product 3-4 times a week a number of people commented that my hair looked thicker or fuller. I just started taking biotin vitamins with it, but I gotta say - this is worth a try. Be sure to let the shampoo soak in for 3-4 minutes before washing it out
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I noticed I had a bald spot from wearing my hair in ponytails all the time, so I decided to do something about it. My friend told me about this product so I bought it immediately! Whenever I use it, I let the shampoo sit on the top of my head/hairline while my conditioner moisturizes the rest of my hair- I keep both on at the same time for about 5-7 minutes. My hair has never looked better since using this product. It’s thick, has grown very healthily and is super shiny now. I noticed a difference within a month! Also, the smell is very nice and subtle. I highly recommend to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ...has done little or nothing to improve hair density
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, I first noticed that I had lost about half of my hair in the area on the top of my head back to the usual bald spot area. I started using this shampoo back in Sept of 2018 about 6 days a week. It seems to have somewhat slowed my hair loss but it certainly has done nothing to restore any lost hair, unfortunately. I have started using a Biotin based hair conditioner in addition. So far, I don't see any improvement.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has a horrible chemical smell that you would not want your hair to smell like. I just received it so I don't know if it will help with hair loss. i'll keep it because of the cost but will never buy it again. I'll just have to use another shampoo after it and hope that it covers the smell of this one.
customer_reviews.author: goldsasha2

customer_reviews.title: Ordering my 5th bottle soon!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for about 5 months now and my hair has grown at least 4-5 inches since then which is much longer faster than ever before. It usually takes me a year to grow it that long and I usually cut it before then because it usually gets too difficult to manage when its that long. Since starting that shampoo, my hair is softer, longer and much healthier looking. I do only use the shampoo, however, because the smell is not attractive so I use a better smelling conditioner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Label falling off of generic container . Smells like dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This smells like dog shampoo . The label is coming off in one solid piece and the bottle seems to be one bought from the dollar tree. I would hope the seller would not be fraudulent, but it’s hard to believe anyone would sell this shampoo with the label peeling off , perfectly , as if it were artificially put on. Also, the conditioner label is completely stuck on crooked. That doesn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: tdc

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 product. Think Long Term. Patience.
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 product Everyone excepts fast results. This is a process, not something to happen over night. Be consistent. Leave in your hair for five minutes, scalp massages, and use use daily. THINK LONG TERM. I have bought twice and amazing results. The first time I used off and on and had results, but not as much as intended. Second time was in the last month or two, and AMAZING results. 24yr old Male with amazing an amazing growing hairline now, as well as thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Worked on first try!
customer_reviews.text: For almost a year now, I have been having itchy, bumpy skin around my ear area and scalp. I literally just used it this morning and felt the exact same area I was having issues and I kid you not- it's as if it didn't happen! My skin behind my ear and scalp doesn't feel dry and patchy and there's no more itching. I can't stop touching it, because it's almost as if it was a dream. My only regret is not taking before and after pics. I will probably put more updates later to see what happens. But I am very satisfied with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: No more bald spot
customer_reviews.text: As a woman I didn't like that my hair was so thin and that I had a visual bald spot on the back of my head. I decided to give this shampoo a try but wasn't too hopeful. Well, lo and behold, after a month's use the bald spot is almost completely gone. Even my husband noticed and he never notices anything! I will continue using this product. Def recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Rootie

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it actually works! I was skeptical about trying a new product initially due to the fact that another "natural" shampoo made my hair start falling out! This product takes a couple weeks to show full effects, but if you follow the instructions, then you will see results as well, good luck with your experience!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon H

customer_reviews.title: This works GREAT for my thin, baby-fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, baby-fine, color-treated blonde hair. This works great for me, I wash my hair daily (oily skin/warm climate) and use it about 3-4 times a week. It doesn't strip my hair color, and does give me volume through-out. I recommend for hair types like mine. FYI...my mom borrowed once, and it didn't work for her...she has drier skin/hair, mostly gray, and short hair...she felt it stripped her hair a bit and made a little drier.
customer_reviews.author: Rewind_Review

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, not even to clean your hair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews. This stuff is crap, it does not smell good , my hair does not feel clean after using it and if anything I have actually lost more hair since I started using this. A friend came over and saw it in the shower and said he had purchased it as well and said it was garbage also.
customer_reviews.author: powerby50

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Hair Loss, Naturally Moisturizes Hair, And Promotes Hair Re-Growth
customer_reviews.text: Other shampoos would cause my hair to both get dry, and fall out / get thinner. When I began using this Biotin shampoo, Less-and-Less of my hair would end up in the sink drain trap, with each use. Because there are natural moisturizers in this Biotin shampoo, my hair was no longer getting dried out. After about 1 month of using this Biotin shampoo, I noticed new hair growing on the top of my bald scalp. With consistent use of this Biotin shampoo, and a little patience, my own hair is growing back, and becoming thicker. Yahoo !!!
customer_reviews.author: ASPIEMAN

customer_reviews.title: It works for some hair regrowth
customer_reviews.text: I am close to 60 years and began having some balding patches near the hair crown. I have been using this product for about 6 months, and most of the patches have filled in slightly with fine hair. You should leave the treatment shampoo on the area for a few minutes. The shampoo makes my hair a bit drier than other shampoos so I use conditioner on the sides and back of my hair, not the top of my head, so as not to interfere with the treatment area. Overall, this is a good product and I would recommend to someone who is experiencing hair loss due to aging.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss, dandruff... buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely great. It isn't going to grow your hair back, if that is your problem... but it may very well help you keep what you got. Also this is absolutely excellent for dandruff. I've used plenty dandruff shampoos that did not work, where this has. I love this stuff and highly recommend it. I was not given anything for this review which I feel is important, especially if you look to reviews for unbiased opinions in helping you to make up your mind. If you found this useful however, a 'helpful' vote would be appreciated. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dillwidit

customer_reviews.title: Useless Product - DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the previous reviews, but it did not work in my case and i have been using this for past three months. I had hair before using this shampoo and the count of my hair fall will be approximately 20-30 while bathing but after using this shampoo it increased to 40-50 and this shampoo made me to worry more about my hair. I used weekly twice as suggested by most of the people but it made my hair very nasty. Please DON'T BUY this product based on the reviews better consult a doctor before you plan to buy any shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: kasi

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I spent 6 months on a feeding tube. I was loosing my hair rapidly due to stress/malnutrition. When I got off the tube I used this shampoo along with B complex vitamins and my hair stopped falling out within a month or so. I read about the shampoo online as I was searching for the reason why my hair was falling out. The active ingredients in the shampoo worked wonders I must say. It is a pleasant shampoo in general. I would recommend to someone suffering from hair loss due to vitamin defiency.
customer_reviews.author: 1 spicychef

customer_reviews.title: Finally my hair fall reduced
customer_reviews.text: I had a hair fall problem, especially during the bath. I tried various commercial shampoos including ayurvedic but nothing showed a good result. Finally one of my friends back from India requested to get this Sampoo when I was visiting India. Based on his feedback I started using the Biotin shampoo and the results are quite impressive. Hair fall has reduced, looks strong and shiny. When I was using other shampoos, my fairs look very dry and I felt like those shampoos are quite strong for me. I am using this from the past 10 months and I am quotes settled with this one. I strongly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Shaik

customer_reviews.title: Does it work?
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could tell you for sure that this will re-grow hair or arrest hair loss. I don't know if it does that or not. I do know that it lathers up quite a bit. It's VERY thick. Very thick indeed. It tingles too. My hair doesn't appear to look any differently when I use this as opposed to PERT for example, but I really honestly don't have any idea about the number of hairs on my head. I don't know how to measure that scientifically. It's only been a couple of months. If anything changes, I'll update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Bleach

customer_reviews.title: It's working for me
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that has hair lose or thinning hair grasps at most anything to stop or slow the process. Mine was doing both. I did a little research into the ingredients for this shampoo and found that they will help as well as anything will. Still being a skeptic I bought a bottle. After 2 months I can see that new hair is filling in and it is starting to thicken up. I am resigned to the fact that I will always have to use a shampoo like this to keep the problem at bay but it's a small price to pay for some self comfort.
customer_reviews.author: lynny

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alternative to Prescription Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've had fine thin hair my whole life but I used to have a lot more of it. My hair has been thinning with a lot of fall out. There is a prescription shampoo that is over $100, it used to be the only thing that works. As an autoimmune patient, my body attacks my hair follicles. I thought I'd give it a shot before placing the order with the pharmacy and so far, it seems to have a similar effect plumping and strengthening the existing strands while addressing the problems with new growth. The new fuzzies are visible again at the hairline, always a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Seems Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo and just used it once so far. It felt very greasy when I first applied it to my hair, but that lathered up nicely. My hair felt very clean and shiny. My only concern was that after I set my hair in rollers, when I took it out it had a lot of static electricity. I live in Fl. so it wasn't from the cold. I am wondering if it's ok to keep using this, but haven't been able to see anyone else with the same issue on the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: My hairs gotten alittle longer but still is falling out.had bariatric surgery in Feb so I have been dealing with the hair shedding for a couple months.its still coming out the same,nice change with the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth noticable in a month
customer_reviews.text: My bald spot at the top of my head is definitely reduced. I am doing several things differently so I don't know how much to attribute to this product, but I am happy with the results. I also mix this shampoo with sea salt to rid my scalp of dead skin cells. I take a daily biotin supplement and I use Jamaican castor oil 3 times a week on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Motor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The Shampoo bottle arrived without the pictured box and without a bottle cap (no joke) - I have never seen anything like it. The shampoo itself wasn’t special either, definitely not worth the $10. Not worth the money by any stretch of the imagination!
customer_reviews.author: Philipp Wagener

customer_reviews.title: It Works! Conditioner, too.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have dandruff, but I did have a little bit of itchy scalp once in a while. The itch is gone. I have very fine, curly hair that has thinned with age. This shampoo makes my hair look much thicker and fuller. I'm very happy with the product and will continue to use it. I've also been using the conditioner. It's very lightweight, but perfect for removing tangles and adding just enough moisture to my sometimes dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Olive'sMom

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: What I like: - The scent - The ingredients that helps hair growth - The fresh, clean and light feel to the hair after the wash. It is real. You feel that the hair is really washed and fresh. With the other shampoos, I used to feel the hair kind of restrained and heavy. - The feeling that the shampoo that you are applying to your most visible hair has healthy ingradents. What I dont like: I have to buy conditioner as this is just shampoo. I wish they mix conditioner also to it like other shampoos to make it more complete.
customer_reviews.author: Srinadh Penugonda

customer_reviews.title: Stops hair loss, nice shine, adds body to fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Been using Rogaine on my hair since May 2015 when significant hair loss started (post menopause hair thinning). Have fine, limp cotton candy hair. Still had some hair loss and limp hair Started using Biotin shampoo. Wow! No more hair loss. Nice shine. And after using every hair thickening shampoo in the book, this one adds body. I am not in love with the smell but you get used to it. Otherwise best shampoo EVER! I love this stuff. Spent fortunes on hair products. This shampoo works!
customer_reviews.author: Quirky

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff and itchiness gone after just one shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 8oz bottle to just give it a try since my hair lately had some dandruff and itchiness. Also I’ve been feeling my hair getting thinner and thinner. Bought it based on the reviews and ratings. I was surprised that my dandruff and itchiness went away basically after one treatment. Pretty happy about it so far. Not sure about the hair thickening effects as I haven’t noticed much difference after one bottle. But do feel hair and scalp seem healthier. I’m purchasing another bottle now and will see if there’s any difference on hair thickness after the 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Z. C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something to stop my hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I have had thinning hair for years, I've tried everything to slow it down. I take Biotin pills everyday and when I found Biotin shampoo, well it was a no brainer and I am so glad I took the chance. I've noticed that the amount of hair that I used to see on the bathroom counter after I'm done styling has greatly decreased and my hair looks fuller. Even my hair stylist mentioned that she can see new growth! I'm extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Clean hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, I can’t tell if it made his hair thicker- but he likes the smell and seems happy with the clean feeling it gives his hair so we are on our second bottle. Update: My husband has been using this shampoo for about 6 months now and has seen little to no benefit, from a hair loss/regrowth perspective. However, he does love the smell of it and appreciates the fact that his hair doesn’t dry out. He says his hair feels healthy throughout the day. Overall, he thinks it’s a good product. 4 out of 5. :)
customer_reviews.author: Glow77

customer_reviews.title: High quality shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great for eliminating dandruff. It was so nice to get my husband off the blue smelly stuff! I decided to try it when I ran out of my expensive salon shampoo. I am extremely sensitive to fragrances and chemicals. This product does not bother my sensitive skin at all (and everything does!) and I do not note a strong fragrance smell. I was so impressed with the lather and way my hair felt afterward, good texture and volume, that I've given the pricey shampoo the boot! I wish they'd make a conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try this shampoo it works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shampoo for some time. I’ve tried other products in the past to give health and volume to my hair but none have worked. This is the only one where I have seen definite results. It has a good clean scent and my hair feels very soft and refreshed. I will definitely keep using it since this is the only shampoo where I’ve seen improvement in volume and hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Mamadukies

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, very thin naturally light blonde hair. In the summer especially, it is limp, flat and lifeless. I've been using this shampoo for a couple weeks and it seems to give my hair a bit more body out of the shower, I'm hopeful that with long-term use, I'll see quicker growth and thicker hair, but for now, it's just a nice shampoo. I have not noticed any difference in the amount of hair that is falling out, but I never had an issue with that. The scent is pretty strong, but not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly works but will dry your hair out
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo did seem to slow my hair loss. However, true to the other reviews, it completely dries out your hair. My hair became very dry, brittle, and stringy. I finally had to stop because it made a mess of my hair. I usually have long hair and unfortunately will have to chop off 3 inches to get rid of the damaged hair and restore it back. It’s been 3 months since I stopped using it and my hair is still recovering from this.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen25
